delete.title: Delete Messages
delete.description: Deletes 'x' amount of messages where 'x' is an optional number (bot requires 'Manage Messages' permission as well)
delete.success:
Successfully deleted {0} messages...
This message will delete in 5 seconds.

errors.amount: :warning: Please make sure you are deleting (2-99) messages
errors.noPermission: :no_entry_sign: Please make sure that this bot has the 'Manage Messages' permission
errors.NaN: :no_entry_sign: Number of messages must be a number

kick.title: Kick
kick.description: Kick a member from the guild if you have permission to

errors.noPermission: :no_entry_sign: Please make sure that this bot has the 'Kick Members' permission
errors.notKickable: no_entry_sign: That user is not kickable
errors.failed: :no_entry_sign: Unable to kick, an error occured

ban.title: Ban
ban.description: Ban a member from the guild

errors.noPermission: :no_entry_sign: Please make sure that this bot has the 'Ban Members' permission
errors.notBannable: no_entry_sign: That user is not bannable
errors.failed: :no_entry_sign: Unable to ban, an error occured
